tns:patch.author: cdolghier
tns:patch.description: make the pledges-documents UNIQUE constraint deferrable in order to allow pledges to be updated using normal Hibernate semantics

script.lang: ALTER TABLE amp_funding_pledges_document DROP CONSTRAINT pledgedocumentunique; ALTER TABLE amp_funding_pledges_document ADD CONSTRAINT pledgedocumentunique UNIQUE(pledge_id, title, uuid) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED;
